contexts.context: "I am Kena Zombel <mark>Mokafa</mark>, and I can prove that you do not...
...Benitah has heard of the intelligence of Kena Zombel <mark>Mokafa</mark>, and has said that she was mistaken....
...I had in Nimlom the Mighty, Kena Zombel <mark>Mokafa</mark>, or Master Vomph," replied a feminine voice...
